chunk:
Gaia Skincare Naturally Eye Serum

Brand: GAIA Skincare

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil , **Borago Officinalis (Borage) Seed Oil, **Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Salvia Hispanica (Chia) Seed Oil, **Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Tocopherol, Boswellia Serrata (Frankincense) Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Santalum

(Chia) Seed Oil, **Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Tocopherol, Boswellia Serrata (Frankincense) Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Santalum Spicata (Sandalwood) Oil, Rosa Centifolia (Rose) Flower Oil, **Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract. *Limonene, *Citronellol, *Geraniol, *Linalool,
Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Santalum Spicata (Sandalwood) Oil, Rosa Centifolia (Rose) Flower Oil, **Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract. *Limonene, *Citronellol, *Geraniol, *Linalool, *Citral.

Directions: As this serum is highly concentrated you only need a very small amount. Apply one drop from the pipette to the tip of the index finger. Starting beneath the eyes at the bridge of the nose, gently tap outwards and around to inner brow area to smooth fine lines.

Warnings: If irritation occurs discontinue use. Keep product cool and out of direct sunlight. Not for use directly on eyes.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
